Calculate the maximum width of the incident beam: maximum width corresponds to the chord subtended by the critical angle, angle subtended at the center is 83.62°.
Calculate chord length using formula: Chord length = 2R sin(θ/2), where θ = 83.62°, sin(41.81°) ≈ 0.6667, Chord length ≈ 1.3334R.
